name: XamariniOS
description: Build an iOS app with Xamarin on Mac OS
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: solution
inputs.label: Solution
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from repo root of the Xamarin.iOS solution to build.

inputs.name: configuration
inputs.label: Configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown: Standard configurations are Ad-Hoc, AppStore, Debug, Release.

inputs.name: mdtoolLocation
inputs.label: Override path to mdtool
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally supply the path to mdtool, the Xamarin Studio build tool. When empty, the default path will be used: /Applications/Xamarin Studio.app/Contents/MacOS/mdtool

inputs.name: forSimulator
inputs.label: Build for iOS Simulator
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optionally builds for the iOS Simulator instead of physical iOS devices.
